title: Dark Hunger
description: A beautiful woman releases a Carpathian prisoner from his bonds—and unleashes his appetite in a tale of unexpected desire from #1 New York Times bestselling author Christine Feehan.He is Riordan …Carpathian male. Immortal. Seer. Now trapped and caged, his honor is compromised by his captors. They’re in his mind. They’re in his blood. And not one can withstand his desire for revenge.She is Juliette …A beautiful activist devoted to the liberation of animals from the foul and humid confines of secret jungle lab. What she has stumbled upon is an unexpected prisoner like no other she has ever seen. Or touched.She will release him from his bonds. He will release her from her inhibitions. Both have a voracious appetite that needs to be sated. And tonight their dark hunger will be fed...Previously published in Hot Blooded
author: Christine Feehan
